__e: Sir, I'm very sorry to have to tell you this, but we found Manuel and he had been shot to death.
It's late, Manuel... and I have to take two buses to get home.
I was never going to see Manuel again... and that made me suffer dreadfully
Don Manuel, what you are doing is illegal.
Manuel, what are you doing here?
Look, Manuel, your belt is not the murder weapon, but you are still sitting in the hot seat.
